node.text:
The Kovalam Palace is a historical gem that used to be the summer retreat of the erstwhile Travancore Royal Family. A magnificent property, dedicated butlers, customized menu, specially curated regal decor and the exclusivity here are all designed to take you on a mystical royal sojourn.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
